Google Open Bidder 0.8.1 API

API 
Package Description
com.google.openbidder.api.bidding
Bidding support.
com.google.openbidder.api.click
Click tracking support.
com.google.openbidder.api.impression
Impression tracking support.
com.google.openbidder.api.interceptor
Interceptors and controllers.
com.google.openbidder.api.match
Pixel-matching support.
com.google.openbidder.api.openrtb
Open Bidder's OpenRTB extensions.
com.google.openbidder.api.platform
Classes that provide information on the platform on which the Open Bidder is running.
com.google.openbidder.api.snippet
Support for HTML snippet manipulation (macros, escaping, URL building).
HTTP 
Package Description
com.google.openbidder.http
HTTP support.
com.google.openbidder.http.cookie
Cookies.
com.google.openbidder.http.message
HTTP messages (common core for requests and responses).
com.google.openbidder.http.request
Request messages.
com.google.openbidder.http.response
Response messages.
com.google.openbidder.http.route
Request routing.
com.google.openbidder.http.template
Templates for response messages.
com.google.openbidder.http.util
HTTP Utilities.
Google Compute Engine 
Package Description
com.google.openbidder.bigquery
Google BigQuery support.
com.google.openbidder.cloudstorage
A client for accessing Google Cloud Storage.
com.google.openbidder.cloudstorage.model
Model classes for Google Cloud Storage.
com.google.openbidder.googleapi
Support for Google cloud APIs.
com.google.openbidder.googlecompute
Support for managing Google Compute instances.
com.google.openbidder.oauth.googlecompute
Google Compute Engine environment support for OAuth2.
DoubleClick Ad Exchange / Connector 
Package Description
com.google.openbidder.exchange.doubleclick
General utilities.
com.google.openbidder.exchange.doubleclick.impression
Impression support.
com.google.openbidder.exchange.doubleclick.interceptor
Standard interceptors.
com.google.openbidder.exchange.doubleclick.match
Pixel-matching support.
DoubleClick Ad Exchange / Extensions 
Package Description
com.google.openbidder.deals
Preferred Deals support for DoubleClick Ad Exchange.
com.google.openbidder.deals.model
Native Preferred Deals model, generated from open-bidder-deals/src/main/protobuf/deals.proto.
com.google.openbidder.oauth
Support for OAuth2.
com.google.openbidder.oauth.generic
Generic/Linux environment support for OAuth2.
com.google.openbidder.remarketing.interceptor
Match and Bid interceptors for remarketing.
com.google.openbidder.remarketing.model
Remarketing model, generated from open-bidder-remarketing/src/main/protobuf/remarketing.proto.
com.google.openbidder.remarketing.services
Remarketing service builds and handles the lookup table.
Server Modules (Connector SPI) 
Package Description
com.google.openbidder.bidding
Bidding support.
com.google.openbidder.bidding.interceptor
Standard interceptors.
com.google.openbidder.bidding.json
JSON serialization support for the Open Bidder-specific OpenRTB extensions.
com.google.openbidder.click
Click tracking support.
com.google.openbidder.click.interceptor
Standard interceptors.
com.google.openbidder.impression
Impression tracking support.
com.google.openbidder.impression.interceptor
Standard interceptors.
com.google.openbidder.match
Pixel-matching support.
com.google.openbidder.match.interceptor
Standard interceptors.
com.google.openbidder.server
Core server support.
